price: Dan (dia berkata), "Hai kaumku, mohonlah ampun kepada Tuhan-mu, lalu bertobatlah kepada-Nya, niscaya Dia menurunkan hujan yang sangat deras atasmu dan Dia akan menambahkan kekuatan kepada kekuatanmu dan janganlah kamu berpaling dengan berbuat dosa".
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا وَيَزِدۡكُمۡ قُوَّةً إِلَىٰ قُوَّتِكُمۡ وَلَا تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ مُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi is'taghfirū rabbakum thumma tūbū ilayhi yur'sili al-samāa ʿalaykum mid'rāran wayazid'kum quwwatan ilā quwwatikum walā tatawallaw muj'rimīna
